templates.title: Dokku
templates.description: Dokku setup as a compose file

env.name: VERSION
env.label: Dokku version
env.description: Version of Dokku to use ('latest' if empty)

env.name: DOKKU_HOSTNAME
env.label: Dokku hostname
env.description: Global hostname to be registered by Dokku

env.name: VOLUME_PATH
env.label: Dokku volume path
env.description: Host path to be bound to /mnt/dokku (`/var/lib/dokku` if empty)

env.name: DOKKU_HOST_ROOT
env.label: Dokku host root
env.description: Image build cache path. Generally set to <data dir> + '/home/dokku'

env.name: SSH_PORT
env.label: SSH port
env.description: Host port to expose SSH port of Dokku (22 if empty)

env.name: HTTP_PORT
env.label: HTTP port
env.description: Host port to expose HTTP port of Dokku (80 if empty)

env.name: HTTPS_PORT
env.label: HTTPS port
env.description: Host port to expose HTTPS port of Dokku (443 if empty)

templates.description: Access Siemens SINUMERIK 840D sl/pl controllers and provide data via OPC UA and MQTT

templates.title: Softing EdgeConnector Siemens
templates.description: Connect Siemens SIMATIC S7-300/400/1200/1500 PLCs and provide the data via OPC UA and MQTT

templates.title: Softing EdgeConnector FANUC CNC
templates.description: Connect FANUC CNCs and provide the data via OPC UA and MQTT

templates.title: Softing EdgeConnector Aggregator
templates.description: Offers a powerful OPC UA aggregation service which provides data via OPC UA, as well as MQTT

templates.title: OPC Router
templates.description: No-code middleware for industrial applications The OPC Router connects PLCs, PCS, SCADA, MES, SQL databases and servers, label printers, e-mail servers and erp-systems via OPC UA, MQTT, REST, CSV and many others without any programming effort
templates.note: More information about the EULA.

templates.title: Pro Mosquitto with Management Center
templates.description: Commercial-grade Mosquitto MQTT broker with Management Center
templates.note: The Mosquitto broker password must be at least 12 characters.

templates.title: Node-Red
templates.description: Low-code programming for event-driven applications
templates.note: The TZ must be in Unix Format eg America/New_York - see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones.

templates.title: InfluxDB for Edge
templates.description: InfluxDB Time Series Data Platformm - Single Server deployment
templates.note: Admin Password must be at least 10 characters

templates.title: EMQX Open Source MQTT Broker
templates.description: Open-source MQTT broker for IoT, IIoT, and connected vehicles - Single Broker deployment

templates.title: Grafana Dashboard
templates.description: Multi-platform open-source interactive visualization web application

templates.title: Inductive Automation - Ignition Gateway

templates.title: Timescale DB
templates.description: Open-source time series database developed by Timescale Inc

templates.title: Manubes Edge Node
templates.description: High-performance cloud platform for industrial production management. Manubes is a no-code solution that is used to structure, monitor and control production data, systems and processes in the cloud.

templates.title: Anyviz Cloud Adaptor
templates.description: The cloud adapter connects local devices via OPC-UA, Modbus, Siemens, Beckhoff ADS, EtherNet/IP, M-Bus and BACnet to the AnyViz Cloud.

templates.title: Litmus Edge
templates.description: Litmus Edge is an edge data platform that enables industrial AI at scale. It connects, processes, and analyzes real-time OT data at the edge to power smart manufacturing.

templates.title: Litmus Edge Digital Factory Demo
templates.description: Demo System for Litmus Edge. Litmus Edge is an edge data platform that enables industrial AI at scale. It connects, processes, and analyzes real-time OT data at the edge to power smart manufacturing. Note: Requires 5GB Disk Space / 3GB RAM available on the Host for deployment to succeed.
